e="preserve">Ristolas is a former commune in the Hautes-Alpes department and Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region in southeastern France. It is now part of Abriès-Ristolas.
Geography.
Ristolas is in the Cottian Alps. The Guil river passes through the village.
Road.
The D947 and D947T roads pass through Ristolas.
